snippet: The news heartened officials who remained concerned at the steady numbers regarding marijuana and e-cigarette use.
abstract: National Institute on Drug Abuse report indicates misuse of prescription painkillers among teenagers is declining; percentage of 12th graders who said they had used narcotics other than heroin fell to 5.4 percent from 9.5 percent in 2004.
lead_paragraph: The news heartened officials who remained concerned at the steady numbers regarding marijuana and e-cigarette use.

headline.main: Report Finds Less Misuse of Painkillers by Teenagers
headline.print_headline: Report Finds Less Misuse of Painkillers by Teenagers
